ai-patthana17.22:0.2_0: Having given the immaterial states produced by the phenomena that are counterpart of
ai-patthana17.22:1.1_0: results in principles, resulting in good qualities, not skillful qualities.
ai-patthana17.22:1.1_1: ‘... for the sake of conditioned things.’ ...
ai-patthana17.22:1.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana17.22:2.1_1: ‘... for the sake of conditioned things.’ ...
ai-patthana17.22:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana17.22:3.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
